definition: Kunqu opera, influential musical theater originating in Kunshan, Jiangsu province in Yuan times
used in place names, notably Kunlun Mountains 崑崙|昆仑[Kun1 lun2]/(also used for transliteration)
descendant/elder brother/a style of Chinese poetry

sentences.english: When Qu flute accompanies with Kun opera, it fully embodies the advantages of itself.
sentences.chinese: 曲笛为昆曲伴奏的时候，充分体现了自身的优势。

sentences.english: That’s the only way to revive Kunqu.
sentences.chinese: 这是复兴昆曲的唯一途径。

sentences.english: Part five is the review of contemplation on modern Kunqu education.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分，近现代昆曲教育的回顾与思考。

sentences.english: Now Kunqu troupes are trying to grab attention with provocative shows.
sentences.chinese: 现在各昆曲剧团试图演出有噱头的剧目来争取关注。

sentences.english: Kunqu Opera is rated by UNESCO as Oral and Non-material Heritage of Mankind.
sentences.chinese: 昆曲评为“人类口头和非物质文化遗产”。

sentences.english: Most of the roles of Guan Yu on the opera stage are played in Kunqu.
sentences.chinese: 戏曲舞台上的关公戏，很多都是唱昆曲的。

sentences.english: So, Kunqu elements are still discernible in Peking Opera.
sentences.chinese: 在京剧里，我们还可以看到昆曲的影子。

sentences.english: Many Kunqu performers recall the low points of the 1990s.
sentences.chinese: 许多昆曲演员都记得九十年代的低谷。

sentences.english: The emergence of Kunqu symbolizes the formation of literati drama.
sentences.chinese: 昆曲的出现，是文人戏曲形成的标志。

sentences.english: Each Kunqu play was an exquisite literary work by some lofty-minded literati .
sentences.chinese: 昆曲的剧本大都是文人雅士精心创作的文学作品。

sentences.english: The Imperial Granary edition The Peony Pavilion offers a concept of returning to the original state of Kunqu Opera.
sentences.chinese: 皇家粮仓版《牡丹亭》以复归昆曲肇始状态的理念。

sentences.english: In the third section, the content of Kunqu opera education is discussed in categories.
sentences.chinese: 第三节，对昆曲教育的内容进行分类论述。

sentences.english: He is also one of a dwindling breed of Kunqu artists.
sentences.chinese: 昆曲传人青黄不接，他是其中之一。

sentences.english: As a master of Kunqu opera, Shen Jing was also involved in the creation of Zaju.
sentences.chinese: 作为一代昆曲大师，沈在杂剧创作方面也有所染指。

definition: The Peony Pavilion (1598), play by Tang Xianzu 湯顯祖|汤显祖[Tang1 Xian3 zu3]
local Chinese opera, such as Shaoxing opera 越劇|越剧[Yue4 ju4], Sichuan opera 川劇|川剧[Chuan1 ju4], Henan opera 豫劇|豫剧[Yu4 ju4] etc
ballad tune in southern dialects, usually to sanxian 三弦 or pipa 琵琶 accompaniment
the Mei Lanfang School/see 梅蘭芳|梅兰芳[Mei2 Lan2 fang1]
local Chinese opera, such as Shaoxing opera 越劇|越剧[Yue4 ju4], Sichuan opera 川劇|川剧[Chuan1 ju4], Henan opera 豫劇|豫剧[Yu4 ju4] etc
